title: Default value lost after modifying report parameter
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When modifying the default value in the list box of a report parameter, the new default value is not retained.
EB: After modifying the default value in the list box of a report parameter, the new default value should be saved and displayed.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Locate the list box for the parameter.
3. Check the current default value.
4. Modify the default value.
5. Save the changes.
6. Close and reopen the report parameter settings.
7. Verify that the modified default value is still retained in the list box.
